title: Player MOT: swap-avoidant tracking and segmentation
scope: Implement/extend multi-object tracking for players with a swap-avoidant policy (break over swap).
Bound state and enforce deterministic ordering.
Emit explicit break_reason when segments end due to ambiguity.
acceptance: Tracker produces track segments and ends segments on ambiguous association (no swaps).
Tracker is deterministic for fixed inputs (stable ordering and IDs as defined).

Config is explicit and bounded (no runaway track state).
